questions.name: Field Completeness
questions.description: Proportion of mandatory schema fields populated

questions.name: Entry Length Adequacy
questions.description: Narrative fields have meaningful content length
questions.evidence: description: The CHoRUS Network dataset is a diverse, high-resolution, ethically sourced, AI-...

questions.name: Keyword Diversity
questions.description: Number of unique keywords provided

questions.name: File Enumeration and Type Variety
questions.description: Number of files and file type diversity

questions.name: Data File Size Availability
questions.description: Presence of file size or dimensional metadata

questions.name: Dataset Identification Metadata
questions.description: Presence of unique identifiers (DOI, RRID, URLs)

questions.name: Funding and Acknowledgements Completeness
questions.description: Presence of funding sources, grants, sponsors

questions.name: Ethical and Privacy Declarations
questions.description: Deidentification methods, IRB approvals, ethical sourcing
questions.evidence: Missing: deidentification_and_privacy, ethics, ethical_reviews, is_deidentified, informed_consent

questions.name: Access Requirements Documentation
questions.description: Access policy and license clearly defined

questions.name: Interoperability and Standardization
questions.description: Standard formats, ontologies, schema conformance

questions.name: Tool and Software Transparency
questions.description: Preprocessing libraries or tools documented

questions.name: Collection Protocol Clarity
questions.description: Participant recruitment and data acquisition described

questions.name: Version History Documentation
questions.description: Multiple version records with dates

questions.name: Associated Publications
questions.description: Formal citations or DOI-linked references

questions.name: Human Subject Representation
questions.description: Demographics, diversity, subgroup details

questions.name: Findability (Persistent Links)
questions.description: Persistent URLs for access and documentation

questions.name: Accessibility (Access Mechanism)
questions.description: How users can obtain the dataset

questions.name: Reusability (License Clarity)
questions.description: License clearly defined with reuse terms

questions.name: Data Integrity and Provenance
questions.description: Change logs or provenance tracking

questions.name: Interlinking Across Platforms
questions.description: Cross-platform dataset links
